ygData.subject: The old brass problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail everyone Yes, it s that time again, I ve made it to the dizzy heights of 18, and like all good bards I want to practice my new song to perfection. And I
ygData.messageBody:
Hail everyone

Yes, it's that time again, I've made it to the dizzy heights of 18,
and like all good bards I want to practice my new song to perfection.
And I would .... if I could only get the damn thing started.

Anyway, my question is simply this ... what instrument should I be
using for this Discord thing. I've tried a horn, but that didn't seem
to do much for me. And I can't find anything else that looks like
it's vaguely brass. Been through all the guilds and nothing. Where
oh where is that shiny new instrument I've been waiting all my life
for!?

Yours in desperation to dazzle the audience with new songs

--
Saldara, High Elf Wizard (29 ... again)
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (18)
Brindarya, Dark Elf Warrior (5)
